All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
CalculaNominas
The class CalculaNominas is a class that calculates the salary of an employee
DatosNoCorrectosException
This class is a custom exception class that extends the Exception class.
DBconexion
It's a singleton class that returns a connection to the database
Empleado
The class Empleado extends the class Persona and adds the attributes categoria and anyosTrabajados
EmpleadosDB
It connects to the database, creates a statement, executes a query, and returns a list of employees
Nomina
It reads the employee's data from a file, calculates the salary and writes it to another file
Persona
A class that represents a person
PruebaConexion
It creates a connection to the database and then calls the getEmpleados() method from the EmpleadosDB class
PruebaEmpleados
This class is the main class of the program, it's the one that handles the user input and calls the methods from the other classes
